title: 06/17/2021 - Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/17/2021 - Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin gives credit to Paul George for the biggest win in Clippers history to take a 3-2 lead over the Jazz without Kawhi Leonard. He says it's officially time to break up Ben Simmons and Joel Embiid after another humiliating meltdown blowing a 26 point lead against the Hawks. He reacts to big news out of the NBA with another super star trying to force his way onto a new team. Plus, NBA champion Jason Terry joins the show to talk about Luka Doncic's unhappiness in Dallas and Giannis' struggles in the playoffs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
